title.rendered: Men`s Navy California Splashes AV15 Fleece Pullover Hoodie

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1483438174402{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Stay warm while cheering for your California Splashes with this Navy AV15 Fleece pullover hoodie![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Material: 76% Cotton/24% Polyester — Body; 100% Polyester — Hood Lining
  • Lightweight hoodie suitable for mild temperatures
  • Scuba hood with drawstring closure
  • Zipper garage
  • Embroidered fabric applique

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Long sleeve
  • Machine wash, tumble dry low
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported
  • Brand: StylemixThemes

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: On the frontend, when viewing a variable product, the user is presented with dropdown boxes to select variation options. Selecting options will reveal information about the variation, including available stock and price.
